userDefaultRoot.TXT_SOURCE: The source code for this game is available for free! To obtain the code, visit neat-games.com/source
userDefaultRoot.TXT_ERROR_GAMECENTERCONNECTION: Connection to global leaderboard not established.
userDefaultRoot.DESC_MESH: Connect nodes to balance them. Solve a graph by making all nodes 0.
userDefaultRoot.DESC_TREE: Tilt the device to avoid hitting trees. Survive as long as you can!
userDefaultRoot.DESC_SNAKE: Swipe your finger to navigate the snake and collect the stars!
userDefaultRoot.DESC_RAID: Destroy the enemies and survive as long as possible!
userDefaultRoot.DESC_FALL: Tilt the device to move and keep the ball inside the screen!
userDefaultRoot.DESC_DONKEY: Tap to change lanes. Avoid hitting the donkey!
userDefaultRoot.DESC_MELODIE: Remember the shining blocks and tap them in correct order to score!
userDefaultRoot.DESC_BLOB: Match at least three Blobs of the same color to activate them. Touch bombs to explode!
userDefaultRoot.MeshBreakHighScore: Good job! You broke the high score!
userDefaultRoot.HelpPlayer: This is your avatar. Your mission is to collect the star in each maze without dying. Swipe your finger to move.
userDefaultRoot.HelpRobot: Hungry Noise-Activated Drones: These lethal robots come after any noise that they detect. They will try to take the shortest path to you, and if it's blocked, they won't move.
userDefaultRoot.HelpBlackhole: Black Holes: They suck any object that comes near them.
userDefaultRoot.HelpStar: Star: Collect to go to the next level.
userDefaultRoot.HelpGem: Gem: Collect to spend on buying games and features.
userDefaultRoot.HelpConclusion: For more Neat Games please check out facebook.com/ThisIsNeat.
userDefaultRoot.ExtraLockedGameMessage: To unlock this game, you need to pay %d gems or get the pro version of this bundle.
userDefaultRoot.UnlockEpisodeMessageWithProVersion: To unlock this episode, you need to pay %d gems or buy the pro version of this game.
userDefaultRoot.UnlockEpisodeMessage: To unlock this episode, you need to pay %d gems.
userDefaultRoot.UnlockEpisodeMessageWithProgress: To unlock this episode, you need to first finish the previous episode!
userDefaultRoot.EpisodeFinishedText:
You have finished all levels in this episode of Game of Drones.
Check back for more levels in future updates!
userDefaultRoot.DESC_Contrast: Find blocks with unusual colors among other blocks!
userDefaultRoot.CONTRAST_HELP_ONELINE: Tap on the circle that looks odd.
